channel.title: Parallel Programming on Nicholas Ng
channel.description: Recent content in Parallel Programming on Nicholas Ng

item.title: Multiparty Session C
item.description: Session C is a communication-safe programming framework which combines multiparty session types with the C programming language. Publications Session Types: Towards safe and fast reconfigurable programming Multiparty Session C: Safe Parallel Programming with Message Optimisation Related resources Session C on GitHub (wiki) or as libraries Google PhD Poster Competition 2013 entry Runner-up, 3rd year category Session C (old repository) on Google code Scribble project
